page.title: 14Children At Home:Leisure.
page.content: 20 out of 21 children in the top class have a television in family,this is the major leisure activity.One farming family do not have a television through choice,radio entertainment is enjoyed.Four children have a video game facility,computers are a popular Christmas possibility.95% of families have colour television,2 children have a television for their personal use. All the children enjoy music,pop music the majority choice,the top five groups are Duran Duran,Wham,Shakin Stevens,Culture Club and Madonna.Instruments that the children play are guitars,recorders and piano. Popular choices of solitary entertainment were playing with lego,reading,scalextric,playing with dolls,and playing with electric trains.When playing with friends,the children chose Hide and Seek as the
